content: **find the free version of this pattern here 1 ** picot dishcloth & towel - add a touch of color and pop of picot to your home freshen up your kitchen with the picot dishcloth & towel this fun and easy crochet pattern is great for beginners to try out a few new stitches and makes a relaxing project it uses a worsted weight cotton yarn which works up quickly and holds up beautifully over years of use in your home grab your favorite cotton yarn and you ll have a stack of these in no time to stash away for yourself or to give as gifts visit www woodsandwool com for the free version of this pattern pattern + download - please note this listing is for a pattern only - pattern is written in us terms - pattern includes a video tutorial for the picot border - this pattern will be delivered via email in the form of a digital file pdf upon purchase skill level - crochet pattern - this pattern is beginner-friendly but does require some knowledge of basic stitches and pattern reading copyright the picot dishcloth & towel pattern and photographs are property of woods and wool and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not alter share or sell this pattern in any way however you are more than welcome to sell the finished product please credit woods and wool by including a link to the pattern listing if selling the finished piece online share your work follow along on instagram at @woodsandwool tag @woodsandwool and use the #picotdishset hashtag to show off your beautiful new dishcloth & towel 1 https //www woodsandwool com/free-crochet-pattern-picot-dishcloth-towel/
